inn1.comm: overthrows first ball, short of a good length on middle and off, rocks back to play it into the leg side, a needless throw from square leg and Parthiv isn't able to cover it, two more added
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and drops it down to point
good length outside off, nips away just a hint and Edwards lets it go
short of a good length outside off, rocks back and punches it between extra cover and mid-off for a couple of runs
a touch fuller, getting it move away, pushes at it and then withdraws, straight to the keeper
short of a good length outside off, squared him up with some away movement, a decent first over from Praveen
holding it back a little and beating him straightaway, nips away from a good length and just evades the outside edge as Simmons plays forward
a touch fuller this time, leaving the right hander again, shoulders arms to that one
pitched on a good length on the off, gets a stride out and defends it solidly back to the bowler
shortish on the off, rocks back and punches it straight to extra cover
lovely, but no movement on that one, went straight on, landed in the channel outside off and held its line, Simmons left that alone
short of a good length this time, getting it to move away a hint, leaves it alone
fullish, trying to tempt him to drive, moves away significantly and Edwards wisely leaves it be
short of a good length outside off, cut hard to the left of Virat Kohli and he dives but fails to prevent the single
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and defends it to point
beaten, flirting with a shortish delivery that moved away just a touch, pretended to withdraw but after it had gone past him
short of a good length, appears to hold its line this time, leaves it alone
good length, in that corrdior, Simmons gets a stride out and shoulders arms, slow start for the Windies, rather a watchful one
fullish outside off and getting some movement away from the right hander, left alone
slightly short on the off stump, rocks back and pushes it towards point
goodish length on the off, gets forward and pushes it firmly to the bowler
shortish outside off, moving away again, the openers are biding their time here, leaves it alone

dropped, but what a toughie? Pitched on a good length and it was smashed back towards the bowler, over him actually. Munaf stuck his right hand out but there was no way he was clasping that, so powerfully was it struck that it made it to the ropes comfortably despite the brief interception from Munaf
nicely done, held back the length this time but Edwards cashed in on the width, stood tall and smacked it hard past extra cover for four more
short of a good length on the off, punched towards mid-off
worked away off the back foot past square leg, a touch short and he closed the face on that one after a shuffle
after a few quiet overs, Edwards has decided to open up, on a good length, he stays his ground and slaps that over mid-on, powerfully hit again
slightly short on the off, takes his bottom hand off when playing that one, knocks it down into the leg side for a single
gets behind that one nicely and defends it back to the bowler with a full face
a touch fuller but he opts to play it off the back foot again, pushes it gently towards mid-on and squeezes a single
length ball around off stump, played towards the off side
short of a length and that one lobs up, tennis ball style, the batsman lets it go outside off
Simmons gets on top of the bounce this time and cuts the ball hard into the ground towards point
defended from the crease towards the off side, sleepy pace to proceedings this over
left alone outside off stump
good length angling into the right hander, the batsman dabs towards the off and sets off for a quick single
short of a length outside off, Simmons moves across his crease and defends back down the pitch
this time he goes on the attack, moving forward, walking into the shot and lofting the ball cleanly down the ground
Simmons stays in his crease and punches the ball towards short cover
Praveen keeps it straight and on a good length, Simmons moves across and defends
played off the back foot towards wide mid-off for a single to Harbhajan
nudged from the crease towards the leg side
punched off the back foot towards cover where Raina dives to his left and brings it down
Simmons backed away towards leg to make room but Munaf gave him nothing, forcing him to defend towards mid-off by following him
short ball and that is smacked by Simmons over the infield at midwicket, that is a poor ball, cannot bowl that length at gentle medium pace, Simmons dismissed it
defended towards cover
Simmons dabs the ball towards mid-on for a quick single, the fielder comes charging in but fails to pick it up, allowing the batsmen an extra run
defended on the back foot towards cover
Edwards attempts to sweep but fails to connect, a limp shout for lbw from Mishra
Edwards stays in his crease and defends compactly towards point
driven from the crease towards mid-on, where the fielder is deep
big turn for Mishra, he slants the ball towards leg stump on a good length, Simmons presses forward and then the ball spins past his outside edge across off stump
more turn from Mishra as Simmons defends this on the off side
Simmons tries to cut but gets more of a thick edge wide of the man at first slip, the ball races towards third man where Kohli dives and saves one
edged and caught! But it's a no-ball! Simmons moved forward to hit a good length ball on the up down the ground, he got a thick edge to Parthiv but Munaf had over-stepped
the free-hit is a full ball outside off, Simmons made room and then jammed his bat down to guide the ball towards third man
Edwards plays inside the line of a good length ball outside off and the keeper collects
Edwards drags the ball from middle stump towards midwicket
82mph outside offstump from Munaf, Simmons chases it and gets beaten once again, the bounce on that was low
Simmons strides forward and defends the ball towards cover
good length on off stump, driven off the front foot towards point
that was the googly and neither the batsman nor the keeper read it, Edwards played for the turn and got beaten between bat and pad, Parthiv also failed to collect cleanly
Simmons lunges forward this time and takes one hand off the bat after he makes contact with the sweep, he's hit it cleanly into the gap on the deep backward square leg boundary
huge appeal for caught behind as Simmons is beaten by the turn after the ball pitches outside leg and rips across off stump, Simmons was beaten comprehensively, hard to say if he nicked it
defended on the front foot
played towards cover
full and straight from Mishra, defended back to the bowler
bowls flat through the air from round the wicket, the batsman tries to sweep but doesn't make proper contact, the ball trickles past leg stump and the keeper
Edwards defends off the front foot towards cover
he's bowled that wide outside leg from round the wicket, it's too wide for Edwards to connect with the sweep, it's too wide for Parthiv to collect
Edwards charges, gets to the pitch of Harbhajan's delivery and carts him cleanly over the long-on boundary, take that!
Edwards moves back and lets Harbhajan's ball hit him on the thigh after it pitches outside leg
flicked off the pads behind square
Simmons strides forward to an offbreak that slants across him before spinning back, he defends on the leg side

caught behind! Edwards pushes tentatively off the front foot at a legbreak that breaks big from leg stump across the right-hander, he had to play it and the ball bounced and took the edge through to Parthiv, who took a sharp catch
the quicker ball from Mishra, Sarwan defends on the off side
Sarwan stays in his crease, gets behind the line, covers for the turn and defends solidly
played off the back foot towards cover point
massive turn from Mishra, he pitched that around middle and spun it sharply with good bounce across Sarwan, who was beaten, most people would have been beaten by that one
defended on the off side
Simmons gets an edge but he had opened the face as well and played with soft hands so the ball fell short of slip
played towards the leg side, Simmons wants one but it isn't there
Harbhajan bowls a straight one down leg side, another wide
where's the turn for Harbhajan? I'd be queuing to bat at his end at the moment! The batsman plays of the back foot towards cover point for one
Harbhajan once again pitches outside leg and Sarwan didn't make contact, the ball went between Parthiv pads for five more wides
Harbhajan goes over the wicket and angles one into the right-hander, Sarwan nudges on the leg side
Sarwan gets a leading edge but it falls short of the bowler
short length and there's a bit of width for Sarwan, he goes back into his crease and cuts the ball deftly through point against the turn, Sarwan backed away a touch to make room
short ball outside off, the batsman comes forward and misses
swept towards deep backward square leg
superb strike! Mishra pitches it up around off, the length was full and Simmons went down on one knee and slog swept it powerfully over the deep midwicket boundary, he hit it against the turn
defended towards backward point
Mishra replies with a quicker one that dips on middle stump and rips past the outside edge of Simmons' forward prod
defended on the front foot towards the off side
hits a good length on off stump, the batsman stays in his crease and defends
that is so deft! Munaf thinks it's an edge but I think Sarwan opened the face late and guided the ball fine, wide of the keeper and fine of the fielder at third man
good length on a line just outside off, Sarwan shoulders arms
Munaf gets the ball to bounce off a good length and seam away a touch just outside off, Sarwan shaped to play it but then tried to leave it, got into a bit of a tangle
defended on the off side
Sarwan strides forward and plays a punchy drive towards the left of Harbhajan at mid-off, he dives over the ball and fails to stop it cleanly, he did get a hand on it though
Simmons moves forward to take the ball as soon as it pitches and then clips it through midwicket, brave stroke against the spin, getting to the pitch was the key
that's the googly outside off stump and Sarwan cuts it to point
played towards extra cover off the back foot
short ball with width outside off, Sarwan goes back and cuts towards deep point
Simmons strides forward and defends
Mishra tosses it out outside off, not hitting that line around leg and middle which troubled the batsmen earlier, Simmons plays it towards point
Sarwan punches off the back foot towards cover for a single
Praveen keeps it on a good length and straight, Simmons defends on the leg side
Simmons moves across his stumps to glance the ball off his pads towards long leg
Sarwan taps the ball with soft hands into a yawning gap in the square leg and midwicket region
nudged off the pads through square leg for a single
Sarwan moves back and across to play a classy punch through backward point
Mishra drops the ball on a middle stump line and spins it across the right-hander, beating Sarwan's attempt to defend on the back foot
a touch short and Sarwan stays in his crease and plays a short-arm pull through midwicket
Simmons tries to sweep a legbreak but the ball spins across him and hits the arm
played back to the bowler
Simmons strides toward and defends
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Sarwan hits the ball in the air but over the infield at cover, he reached out for a wide one and connected with the bottom of the bat, the batsmen didn't run with any urgency
good length ball angling into Simmons who nudges on the leg side
Sarwan stays in his crease and opens the face to guide the ball towards third man
played towards square leg for a single
Sarwan moves across in his crease and flicks the ball off his pads through square
full ball on middle and leg, Simmons flicks the ball fluently towards deep midwicket, six singles off that over
Simmons moves forward and drives the ball towards long-off, flat trajectory from Yusuf outside off
Sarwan moves back and plays it towards the bowler

Sarwan glances the ball deftly off the pads towards fine leg where Harbhajan does well to pick it up just inside the boundary, he throws it back to the wicketkeeper who broke the stumps, Sarwan had put his bat back in the crease well in time, the umpire asks for replay help
played behind square once again and West Indies reach 100
played towards short third man for a quick single, the throw from the fielder is poor to Parthiv
played off the pads towards short fine leg where Harbhajan can't prevent a single
Simmons greets him with a gentle on-drive for a single to long on
Harbhajan pitches the ball around off and spins it into Sarwan who gets hit on the pad while trying to play towards square
played back to the bowler from the crease
Sarwan comes down the track and plays towards midwicket
Sarwan uses the angle into him to work the ball off his pads through square leg, Badrinath charged in from the boundary to prevent the second
Simmons plays the ball fine off his pads but Rohit stops the single at short fine leg
played off the back foot behind point
nudged from the crease towards the leg side
played off the front foot towards midwicket once again
played of the back foot through point for a single
played off the front foot towards cover
Simmons charges and makes superb contact, lofting the ball with a straight bat over the long-on boundary to move on to 49, he is showing lots of intent
Sarwan backs away and tries to cut from close to off stump, he gets beaten and Parthiv gets excited
he defends an offbreak that turns into him towards the bowler
Sarwan moves back and opens the face with soft hands towards short third man
flatter and quicker ball on off and middle, Sarwan stays in his crease and plays towards cover
Sarwan backs away to cut again from close to off stump, playing against the turn, he cuts it towards Munaf at short third man
played back towards the bowler
Yusuf slants down leg side and he'll have to bowl that one again
played towards midwicket
Simmons gets to his half-century by forcing the ball off the back foot towards long-on, the small crowd at Queen's Park Oval gives him a cheer
Sarwan also plays towards long-on for a single
Simmons stays in his crease, moves across and nudges towards square leg
Yusuf slants towards leg and Sarwan flicks the ball off his pads towards square leg
played towards the off side and the fielder at cover swoops on the ball, deterring the batsmen from taking a single
Sarwan moves back and works the ball off his body behind square
Simmons moves back and punches the ball towards Kohli at extra cover
Simmons tries to play the ball on the leg side but gets hit on the pad
Simmons lunges forward to defend and gets hit on the glove by one that spins and bounces, got hit flush on the glove
played towards short fine leg
quicker ball on middle stump, Simmons stays in his crease and plays towards midwicket
Sarwan works a straight ball off his pads to midwicket
Sarwan gets hit on the pad while trying to play to leg
Sarwan moves back and makes room to drive the ball exquisitely through extra cover
Yusuf drifts on to leg and Sarwan plays it off his pads behind square
Simmons flicks the ball off the front foot towards deep square, quick running and they capitalise on Munaf's fumble

stumped off a wide down leg side! Simmons charged, perhaps a bit too early. Yusuf angled the ball down leg side and spun it away further. Parthiv collected and whipped off the bails with Simmons well out of his crease. Even his dive couldn't get him close to safety.
Samuels moves across and plays the ball behind square
Samuels moves right across and defends on the leg side
Samuels goes right back again, waits for the ball to turn, and glances the ball through square

Harbhajan slows it up and hits Sarwan on the pad with the offbreak, he should have been forward there, the ball might have missed leg, Harbhajan thought he had a strong lbw case as Sarwan was caught on the crease
played through backward square for one
played towards midwicket where Raina cuts it off
played towards midwicket once again
Sarwan forces the ball off the back foot towards deep cover, he made room to hit that ball
driven down to long off for a single
played back to the bowler
driven towards long off for one more
Sarwan stays in his crease and punches the ball towards midwicket
played towards deep point for a single, he wanted to drive but got a bit of an outside edge
Sarwan moves back and cuts one that bounces a touch more through point
Samuels leans forward and drives towards long-on for a single
defended on the back foot towards the on side
Sarwan misses the sweep against the full ball and is hit on the pad, Harbhajan appeals but that was slipping down leg
driven through cover for a single, Kohli fields in the deep
Samuels goes back and turns the ball off his body, that was in the air but it went past the fielder at leg slip
defended on the front foot on the off side
Samuels plays towards point and then there's an overthrow at the bowler's end which allows the single
played through square leg for one more
steered with an open face towards short third man
Sarwan leans forward to drive, he's a bit too early on the shot and plays it towards long off
Samuels stays in his crease and cuts the ball towards deep backward point
played back to the bowler on the front foot
driven past the bowler towards mid-off
Raina strays down leg and Samuels can work it through midwicket
played towards wide mid-on but Kohli sprints across from midwicket and cuts it off
Sarwan plays the ball late and opens the face to steer it late towards third man
Sarwan goes back to cut but doesn't have much room, he bottom edges it into the ground past the keeper
Yusuf is bowling flat and straight, Samuels plays towards the bowler
Samuels stays in his crease and plays the ball off the back foot from his stumps behind point
Sarwan moves forward and nudges the ball towards the leg side, Yusuf bowling very slow
strays on to leg stump this time, Sarwan glances behind square
played off the back foot through point
quicker ball on a wicket-to-wicket line, Samuels moves back and tries to force the ball through the leg side, can't get through the infield
driven towards extra cover off the front foot
the batsman stays in his crease and drives towards long on, Raina tried to dive and stop it but couldn't
the batsman comes forward and drives towards long on
driven off the front foot again, to long off this time
this time the on-drive drive is played with power and purpose, Samuels came forward and drove the full ball straight, giving the fielder in the deep no chance
driven towards deep cover for a single to end the over
there's an lbw appeal from Mishra as Samuels is struck on the pad while defending, but that pitched outside leg
short ball outside off, cut towards deep point where Munaf saves one run with his boot
punched off the back foot towards long off
Samuels plays a lovely cover drive and this time Munaf's boot won't get anywhere near the ball, he hit that fluently off the front foot
Mishra beats Samuels with the legbreak
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Yusuf keeps it full and straight, Sarwan drives towards long on
short ball on leg stump, Samuels comes forward and swats it effortlessly into the gap on the deep backward square  boundary
massive hit! Samuels lays into Yusuf by taking two steps down, getting to the pitch and carting the ball miles over the long-on boundary
Samuels tries to do it again but this time he isn't to the pitch of the ball and gets an outside edge that falls safely over cover
played back to the bowler

stumped! Pathan has hit back in a big way. Samuels charged again, Yusuf responded by bowling the ball outside off stump and it held its line after pitching. Samuels was beaten as he tried to hit down the ground and Parthiv had an easy stumping to complete.
Sarwan stays in his crease and opens the face to steer the ball towards third man
Sarwan plays the on-drive towards long on to give Bravo the strike
good length and straight, Bravo gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler
that one keeps a bit low and Bravo gets going by flicking off his pads behind square
Sarwan tries to drive but gets a thickish outside edge towards third man
Bravo gets another run by playing off his pads behind square
Harbhajan strays down leg side for another wide
Bravo tries to defend but gets hit on the pad
Bravo defends one that pitches outside leg towards the bowler
Bravo moves forward and flicks through midwicket, Bravo urges Sarwan to come back for the second
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Bravo moves forward and plays the on-drive towards long on
flicked through square for a single
good length and straight, Sarwan stays in his crease and defends towards midwicket
that's the slower one and it beats Sarwan as he tries to guide it towards third man
short ball and Sarwan goes past 50 in some style. He stayed back and played a cracking pull to the deep midwicket boundary. It sat up asking to be hit, and Sarwan obliged.
played behind square for another single
another slower ball, Bravo defends on the leg side
Bravo moves across and nudges the ball towards midwicket
Sarwan moves forward and clips the ball to midwicket
driven through cover for a single
the googly jumps up at Bravo who didn't pick it, he had to adjust quickly and fend it down
played behind point for a single
Sarwan cuts and places it past point for another single
pushed towards point and Sarwan wants one. Bravo sends him back. Mishra had run into the stumps at the bowler's end and fumbled the take. Sarwan might have been safe anyway
played off the back foot towards point
good length and straight, Sarwan stays in his crease and defends towards the bowler
a little width outside off and Sarwan cuts towards point
Sarwan cuts again off the back foot but Rohit dives to his right at point to save runs
short of a length on off stump, Sarwan punches off the back foot to Rohit at point

he's done better, that's a wicket maiden! Munaf bowled a high full toss and Sarwan chipped it in the air towards deep square leg where Yusuf ran forward and towards his left from the boundary and judged the catch well. Sarwan's walking off slowly, looking at the umpires for a no-ball for height, it was high but perhaps not above waist.
Pollard plays a powerful drive but can't get it past Harbhajan at mid-off
Pollard lunges forward to defend and gets hit on the pad

lbw! Pollard tried to sweep, getting down on one knee, from way outside off stump. The ball hit him on the pad in line with the stumps and seemed to be going straight through. Umpire Gould thinks it's out and Pollard's on his way for a duck. Fair decision perhaps, but Pollard was a long long way forward.
Baugh tries to defend but gets beaten by the legbreak
Baugh pushes forward and gets beaten by another legbreak, the Indians appeal for a caught behind but Gould is unmoved
defended back to the bowler off the front foot, two wicket maidens in a row for India
Bravo plays the ball towards third man, for the first run in two moves
Baugh fends awkwardly and gets beaten by a good length ball outside off
Baugh attempts to defend again and Munaf appeals because he thinks it hit pad first, no one joins him
Baugh throws his bat at a good length ball and gets a thick edge towards third man
full toss and Bravo plays it through midwicket
full ball on leg stump, Baugh stays in his crease and aims to heave the ball through the leg side, he misses, gets hit on the pad, and keeps strike
Baugh makes room by moving his front pad towards leg and heaves the ball through square leg, he mis-timed it
short ball outside off, Bravo punches off the back foot but can't beat extra cover

caught at long-off and the West Indian cookie continues to crumble. Bravo had to play the big shot, because it's the Powerplay, but he picked out the region where Raina has a fielder in the deep. He came forward and lofted the ball straight to Harbhajan, didn't get to the pitch of the ball and got no power on the shot. Bravo didn't even attempt to run, just walked off as soon as he saw the ball head towards Harbhajan. What if he had been dropped?

bowled him. This is serious rot. Baugh looked awkward during his short innings and it's over now. He attempted the expansive drive against a googly and inside-edged it on to his stumps. He had no clue.
Rampaul strides forward and blocks towards the off side
nudged along the ground towards the man at slip, in the 44th over mind you. Top spell from Mishra, 4-31, got great turn and controlled it superbly.
full ball down leg side, Munaf will need to bowl that again
played off the front foot towards cover
driven off the front foot once again to cover
Sammy fights by playing a powerful cut through point, used the width on offer effectively. West Indies pass 200
the slower one on a good length on off stump, played towards mid-off
that's a full toss which hits the pad after Rampaul misses the glance, was the impact outside leg? It was.
Munaf flings the ball at the stumps after Sammy plays it back to him, he hits, but doesn't concede an overthrow
Harbhajan returns from round the wicket with a slip in place and bowls a tight line on off stump, defended on the front foot
Rampaul heaves across the line and makes great contact, hitting the ball into the gap on the cow corner boundary
defended back to the bowler from the crease
played towards the leg side and Harbhajan moves quickly to field to his left
Rampaul tries to drive through the off but gets an edge on to the pad, that was quicker from Harbhajan
Rampaul sweeps towards backward square where a misfield from Kohli allows the ball through to the boundary
Sammy uses the width outside off to cut but can't beat point
that's extremely wide outside off stump
Sammy swipes at the ball from his crease, this was wide too but not wide enough to be a wide
Sammy flicks towards square for a single
Praveen bowls a full toss from round the wicket, Rampaul drives towards long-on
Sammy tries to play through the leg side but gets hit on the pad, he sets off for a run but turns back after seeing Praveen get to the ball quickly, Sammy didn't know where the ball was
he knows where it is this time! Somewhere beyond the deep midwicket boundary! Sammy flicks the ball crisply, picking it off the front foot and clearing the boundary with ease
played back towards the bowler
width offered outside off stump and Rampaul plays a terrific cut, placing the ball fine enough to beat the fielder at deep point, can West Indies get up to 250?
Rampaul tries to play a deft, late cut but gets beaten
nudged off the front foot towards the off and Sammy calls Rampaul through

Harbhajan pitches outside leg from round the wicket and Sammy gets hit on the pad as he attempts to play on the front foot, he gets a single behind square, the umpire doesn't signal a leg bye so there might have been bat on that
played on the leg side. Harbhajan Singh's done with the ball for today, 10-1-51-0 aren't returns he'd be proud of on this pitch.
short ball and Sammy pulls in the air but the ball falls short of the fielder at deep midwicket

caught! Short of a length delivery and Rampaul gives it everything, the kitchen sink too, heaving across the line, aiming for the midwicket boundary. The ball was angling across him and he ended up spooning it in the air, Raina moved back from midwicket and held the catch on the edge of the inner circle
full ball on the pads, Sammy flicks but Harbhajan dives to his left to make the save
a bouncer from Munaf and Bishoo ducks under it

another short ball and Bishoo is caught behind! Munaf tested Bishoo with another short ball directed across the left-hander without giving him much room. Bishoo fended awkwardly and feathered it to Parthiv
Martin plays the ball through cover and Sammy refuses the single, he had to
Praveen begins the final over with a yorker, which Sammy digs out
he was aiming for another yorker but the ball was full on the pads, Sammy misses the whip and declines the leg bye
another one hits the pad but this time the ball goes fine past the keeper for four leg byes, too full from Praveen on leg stump
Sammy aims a heave down the ground but gets an inside edge on to the pad, that was a slower one perhaps
he's blasted this over long-off! Sammy came forward, latched on to a full ball and slammed it flat over the boundary
Praveen ends the innings with an excellent yorker, Sammy gets hit on the pad, after maybe some bat, and Martin scampers through for one more run

inn2.comm: starts with a wide down the leg side, Parthiv tries to work that fine off his hips but can't
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and drops it down onto the pitch in front of the bowler, solidly defended
short of a good length on the off, taps it towards extra cover
goodish length on the off, rocks forward and pushes it towards extra cover
getsn forward and pushes that straightish delivery back to the bowler
movement for Rampaul, nipped in just a hint, Parthiv got back and tried to crunch that through the off side, got an inside edge onto his pads and it didn't miss the stumps by much
holds back the length again, Parthiv gets back and punches it towards extra cover
good length on the off, Dhawan was half-forward to that one, offered the face, ended up getting an inside edge onto his pads
misfield, Bishoo fumbles at mid-off, pitched up on the off and it's driven firmly just wide of him at mid-off, can't quite get his body behind him and allows them to come back for the second
short of a good length outside off, chops it behind point, wide of third man, for a single
Bishoo fields it well this time, full on the off and it's driven towards him, has it covered
slightly short of a good length, gets on the back foot and punches it towards cover
wristy drive by Parthiv, pitched on a good length, he rocked forward to the pitch and cracked it down the ground to beat the diving Bishoo, nicely timed

Dhawan goes! Short and wide and he went after it, the shot was on, his intention was to clear point but he didn't get much elevation on that one and struck it straight to him instead, India've lost an early wicket, their half-centurion from the previous game
venom from Rampaul, bangs it short on middle and Kohli was caught in two minds, didn't duck and was struck on the helmet as it ricocheted off his glove as he tried to fend it, what a welcome
banged it short again, but down the leg side, Kohli tried to work it fine, just went past the gloves to the keeper, called a wide
short of a good length on the off, defended solidly this time in front of the bowler
well timed, a touch too straight from Raina, turned away past square leg for a brace
slightly short on middle, rocks on the back foot and turns it to midwicket for a quick single just in front of Anthony Martin
shortish on the off, punches it straight to point where Pollard ensures there's no stolen single
bowled it on a good length on the off, gets forward and defends it to mid-on
angling in towards middle and leg, gets forward and turns it to midwicket
kept a little low, a toucher shorter this time on the off, shuffled across and tried to defend it into the leg side, got an inside edge onto his pads
gets front and across and drives that good length delivery to mid-on
back of a length on the off, gets back and punches it to cover
short of a good length outside off, Kohli waits for it and taps it behind point, just wide of third man, for a single
holds back the length does Rampaul and Kohli drops it in the leg side towards mid-on
a touch fuller this time, Kohli gets forward and knocks it firmly into the off side
shortish on middle, gets back and turns it away to square leg
short outside off and Kohli slashed that really hard, got a thick edge and flew over slip to the third-man boundary
shortish on middle, comfortably works it down towards fine leg for a single
nicely timed by Parthiv, on middle and leg, he got across and chipped it uppishly but in that gap between mid-on and midwicket for three more
gets forward and pushes it into the off side
on the front foot again, on a good length and it'd driven to Martin at extra cover
likes playing that shot and he's actually cleared the ropes, short and he seized it early, pulled it hard over square leg to just get it past the fence
shortish on the off, taps it back towards the bowler
angling in from round the wicket towards middle and leg, gets across and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
pushed gently in the direction of a slightly deepish mid-on and they complete the single with ease
slightly back of a length, gets back and turns it wide of Martin at midwicket, he dives to his left and prevents the single, quite an agile chap is Martin
good length and it's driven on the up towards extra cover, nicely timed but straight to the fielder
shortish on middle, gets back and rolls it down towards square leg
on middle and leg, gets across to turn it fine, misses out and is struck high on the pads
ooh, some movement into the right hander, Kohli tried to knock that into the off side, got an inside edge and it ended up bouncing over the stumps
slightly short, gets slightly across and turns it down to fine leg for a single
slips it down the leg side, Kohli tries to work it fine, or glance it fine rather, but it clips the pads on the way to the keeper
short of a good length, punched towards mid-on from the crease
goodish length on the off, gets forward and drops it in front of cover
slower one bowled slightly short on the off, defended into the off side

big appeal for lbw, got well across and looked close on first sight, angling in towards middle and leg, was struck in line but Ian Gould probably thought it was missing leg. Replays show it would just about clipped leg, close call and Gould was probably right in the end
shortish on middle, punches it on the bounce to that short midwicket fielder
shortish on the off, punches it towards cover
lucky Parthiv, an aimless chip, bounced a little more than he expected and he just chipped it over the midwicket fielder, evaded him comfortably
banged in short and Kohli cashes in, gets forward and pulls that handsomely over midwicket
bowled on a good length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
short of a good length, taps it towards point
short ball gets smashed again, shorter than the previous one and Kohli dispatches this disdainfully over square leg this time, a one bounce four
angling it down on the pads when the fine leg is up, played straight to short fine
shortish outside off, runs it down to third man for a single
short of a good length on the off, gets back and drops it down into the off side
slower one bowled full and Kohli doesn't waste that, gets to the pitch and caresses it past cover point for four more
good length on the off, defended cautiously towards cover this time
slightly short, opens the face to guide it to third man for a single
turned away into the leg side
Parthiv gets front and across and clips it through midwicket, it's in the gap and they've come back for the second
lands on a length, drives it hard but straight to mid-off
short of a good length and Parthiv's using his wrists well, gets back and whips it past midwicket into the deep for a couple more
good length on the off, rocks forward and knocks it down towards point
driven on the up through extra cover for a single to keep the strike
A Dhoniesque whiplash from Parthiv, I won't call it that shot which has that flying object in it, but played straight back to the bowler
on middle and leg, turned away towards short fine leg for a single
shortish on middle, gets across slightly and turns it towards short fine
slower one bowled on middle, gets front and across and drives it to midwicket
a touch too straight, flicked away towards deep square leg for a single
fumble from Pollard, drops it wide of him and he overruns the ball and then fumbles
good length on the off, gets forward and defends it back to the bowler
cracked off the back foot through point into the deep for a single
a bit of width and Parthiv slashes that towards third man for a single
back of a length outside off, punched towards cover off the back foot
gets on the back foot and turns it away wide of midwicket
good length on middle and leg, tickled past square leg for a single
pushed away into the off side for a quick single, Parthiv dived full length, and there wasn't even a throw to the striker's end
ooh, angling in and he tried to open the face when there wasn't really much room, got an inside edge just wide of the stumps
shortish on the off, gets across and turns it away to midwicket
just a turn of the wrists and speeds along the outfield, there is a deep midwicket in place and he cuts it off, but they've taken two by then
tight line on the off stump, gets across and plays it back to the bowler
plenty of width, cracked through the covers into the deep for a single
Bravo bowls it too straight, it's fullish on middle, gets across and tickles it past short fine for a couple of runs
fullish on middle, clipped off the pads past square leg for a single
angling in towards middle, whipped through square leg for a single
short ball well down the leg side, tries to help it on its way to the fine-leg boundary but couldn't, it was that wide
fullish, gets across to push it towards mid-on for a quick single, there's an attempt at the non-striker's end but Kohli is well in, he's struck on the leg and takes a tumble, all's well in the end
good length outside off and Parthiv is onto that quickly, perfectly placed between mid-off and extra cover, drives it on the up to collect a boundary
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it wide of midwicket for a single
goes for that whip again but it doesn't quite come off this time, is struck high on the pads
manages it this time, angling in towards middle, worked away past square leg into the deep for a single
drops it in front of cover and sets off for a single, Parthiv responds and makes it in time, an under-arm throw from the fielder misses the stumps but Parthiv is well in
slower one bowled full outside off and Parthiv went after that one, sruck uppishly but wide of Sammy straight to mid-off
short ball on middle, wants to pull it over square leg but is struck on the ribs
starts with a short one, Kohli waits for it to turn away and cuts it down to deep point for a single
a bit of room this time, chopped it behind point for a single
dropped, sharp chance spilt at slip, short outside off, Kohli tried to slash that with the turn, got a thick outside edge and Sammy at slip didn't react in time, how costly will that prove?
knocked away into the off side
tossed up, on middle and off, gets forward and defends it on the pitch
gets to the pitch and pushes it in the direction of cover
short of a good length outside off, tries to cheekily open the face on that one but it hurries through
slower offcutter bowled on a lenght, Parthiv mistimes a drive back to the bowler
shortish and a bit more width offered this time, helping Parthiv run it down to third man for a single
short of a good length, played away towards third man for one more
that whip again, lovely timing, eased towards deep square leg for a single
slower one bowled slightly short on the off, punched to long-on for a single
tossed it up on middle, drove it inside out but straight to extra cover
short on the off, makes room and slaps it to extra cover where Pollard fumbles and allows them a single
slightly short on the off, cracked towards long-off for a single
flighted on middle, swept towards deep square leg to bring up his 2000th run in ODIs
flighted on the off and Bishoo's overstepped, played down to long-on for a single
Another no-ball and Kohli wastes it somewhat, full toss and it's struck on the bounce to deep midwicket, didn't get hold of it, just the single
fires it short on middle, pulls it hard but along the ground and straight to long leg, just the single
turning away, some good bounce there for Bishoo, punched down to deep cover for a single
shortish on middle, punched back towards the bowler
whipped through square leg for a single
a bit of width and he runs it down to third man for one more

goodish length on the off, pushed it towards mid-on and a throw from Edwards lands straight into an unmentionable part of Sammy's body, actually it's mentionable, close to his thigh and not on the unmentionable part
tickled away past square leg for a single
pushed it full on the off, played straight to extra cover
slightly short on the off, pulled away straight to midwicket, mistimed
flighted on the off, driven past the diving extra cover for a single
fetches it from the off does Parthiv and sweeps it down fine for a couple of runs
takes it from the off stump by getting across and drives it down to long-on for a single
beaten, kept it a little flat did Bishoo but gave it some rip, Kohli pushed a little inside the line to that one
flighted on the off, turned away towards midwicket
pushed away to the left of Sammy this time,can't quite get the single
will feel he missed out there, short outside off, it's slapped straight to extra cover
quicker through the air on middle, clipped past square leg for a single
chops that one towards point
pushes it with the turn wide of extra cover to pinch a single, a responsible fifty for the man, survived one dropped chance but barring that he's been very determined
kept a little low, turned away sharply after landing short outside off, Kohli went for the cut, missed
skidded through a little, shortish outside off, punched past the bowler to long-on for a single
slightly short on leg stump, whipped past midwicket for a single
got a leading edge as he closed the face on that one a little, a touch too early, lands short of Pollard at point
flighted on leg stump and turning away, he tried to clear midwicket, got the leading edge again and it landed safe but he was really fortunate this time, evaded extra cover by a fair distance
shortish on middle and leg, pulled away towards deep square leg for a single

dropped, Bravo spills a tough one at long-on, Parthiv fetched it from outside off and dragged it hard towards Bravo, a really difficult chance, it was dying on him and he put in a brave effort but couldn't hold on
drives that inside out past extra cover for a single
appeal for lbw, Parthiv went for a hard sweep, it landed on middle and he tried to play it past square leg, got an inside edge on the pads
he's really stepping it up here, tossed up and it landed on a length on middle, that was a really powerful slog-sweep and cleared deep midwicket, brings up his half-century, in pretty quick time
clipped away past square leg for a single
eased that fullish delivery through the covers for a single to keep strike
shortish on the off, pulls it down towards long-on for a single
flatter on middle, gets across to push it towards midwicket, no single this time
fullish on middle, comes down the track and drives it down to long-on for a single
firmly hit but straight to Pollard at extra cover, shortish outside off and it was swatted straight to him
a little fuller thi stime, played straight to extra cover once more
three dots in a row, punched off the back foot to Pollard again
shortish outside off, run down to third man for a single
good length on the off, driven on the up towards deep cover for a single
slower one bowled full outside off, struck hard towards Bravo on the bounce, just the single to long-on
slower one dragged short on the off, pulled away to deep midwicket for a single
another slower one, on the pads this time, flicked wide of short fine for a single
full down the leg side and it's five wides, Baugh can't quite get is body behind it, bonus runs for India
good running, shortish on the off, just tapped gently into the vacant leg-side field and by the fielder from the deep runs in to reach it, they've taken two

Caught down the leg side, a slightly quicker delivery down the leg side and Parthiv was looking to flick it square, difficult to establish if there was a deflection but Baugh appeared quite confident and Peter Nero took little time in raising his finger
slightly short on middle, gets well across, keeps a little low but manages to play it to square leg for a single
makes just a bit of room and eases that towards deep cover for a single
shortish on middle and leg, turned away past short fine towards long leg for a single
shortish outside off, chopped away past point for a single
goodish length on middle, just turns the face as he bends down to defend, gets a bit of an inside edge onto his pads, takes a single
slower one bowled full on middle, driven back hard at the bowler
shortish outside off, cut towards point
gives him width, and it's short, rocks back and cuts it past point for a couple of runs
good length on the off, driven down towards long-off for a single
goodish length on the off, gets across and turns it to midwicket
slower one bowled short on middle, punched wide of long-on for a couple of runs, well run by Raina
That's Raina's favourite shot, it was in the slot outside off, landed full and he got into position early to dispatch it towards cow corner, he loves that slog-sweep
Raina latches onto that short one this time, this one was held back and dropped short, rocked back to pull it hard through square leg for four more
pushed it on a good length outside off and held its line as Raina drove at it expecting it to turn in, got a thick outside edge to point
driven off the front foot, straight to midwicket this time
turns it wide of midwicket for a single, was bowled slightly quicker on the off
short and Kohli mistimes a pull wide of midwicket for a single to keep strike, raises the 150 for India
drops it short on the off, slapped towards long-on for a single
slower one bowled short on the off, run down to third man for a single
they're looking to finish this quickly, short, a log hop from Pollard, Kohli has no trouble smashing him over midwicket
the offcutter bowled full on the off, drilled back to the bowler who fumbles and Raina races through for a single
down the leg side, clipped wide of a slightly squarish fine leg for two more
short of a good length on middle, punched off the back foot to deep midwicket for a single to keep strike
slightly short on leg, tickles it behind square for a single
finds the gap again, drops it really short, waits for it to turn away and rocks back to pull it hard over midwicket for a one bounce four
flighted outside off, makes room and drives it beautifully past extra cover in the deep, Edwards, I think it is, fields well in the deep, running to his right and returning a quick throw
driven down the ground to long-off for a single
that's disappeared, Bishoo tossed it up, landed full on middle, Kohli made a bit of room, took it off a length and smashed it straight over the bowler's head, over the sightscreen for a maximum
holes out trying to finish it off quickly, comes down the track and hits that well but doesn't get enough elevation, cannot clear Pollard at long-off
shortish from round the wicket on leg stump, pulled past square leg for a single
back of a length outside off, knocks it down in front of point
targeting the ribs, shortish on middle, turns it towards square leg
short of a good length outside off, nips back in a hint, pushed straight to extra cover
short of a good length, tries to nudge it into the leg side, gets an inside edge onto his thigh
turned away sweetly past square leg into the deep for a single
short outside off, Rohit is made to reach for it as it turns away, punched to extra cover
played away off the back foot towards midwicket
lovely delivery, beaten completey, pitched on leg and turned away sharply, beating Rohit with the spin as he tried to open the face at the last moment, just missed off
tries to sweep it square this time, struck on the thighs
punched off the back foot wide of point, no single on offer
gets on the back foot and cracks it past extra cover for a single to keep strike
short of a good length outside off, can't quite pierce the off-side field, plays it towards cover
picks it beautifully, the field is up on the leg side and he takes that from middle and launches it over midwicket, bounces a couple of times before rolling over the ropes
shortish outside off, cut down towards third man for a single
that's it, all over, fullish outside off, steers it wide of point for a couple in the deep to make it 2-0
